methods.name: did_change_plots_render_settings
methods.summary: Notification that the settings to render a plot (i.e. the plot size) have changed.
methods.description: Typically fired when the plot component has been resized by the user. This notification is useful to produce accurate pre-renderings of plots.

methods.name: call_method
methods.summary: Run a method in the interpreter and return the result to the frontend
methods.description: Unlike other RPC methods, `call_method` calls into methods implemented in the interpreter and returns the result back to the frontend using an implementation-defined serialization scheme.

params.name: method
params.description: The method to call inside the interpreter

methods.name: editor_context_changed
methods.description: This notification is sent from the frontend to the backend when the active text editor changes. It provides the document URI of the currently active editor.

params.name: document_uri
params.description: The URI of the active document, or empty string if no editor is active
